name: KKW IDEAL
description:
A pretty new merged model IDEAL for most type of work.

This model work great for realistic and artistic work.

Worked for doing good results with less step(about 20).

Last 3 sample image is for showing how simply is using it for triggering type of art or artist directly.

All sample are simple text2image, no lora or hypernetwork.

All sample image are generated with no Hi.Res fix and no Codeformer.

This is because i think for showing how really model work, the sample image need only based on prompt and not with external inject or correction.

Tested on A1111 with many prompt and many different type of art.

Different sampler tested.

For anime i suggest to use DDIM or EULER_A

Just check sample image, use your own prompt and try.

Know issue:

I generally made image at 1024x768 or 768x1024.

Some prompt maybe get doubled, for fix try to change sampler or reduce the size.

About merging:

Don't know if pruned version work for merging, never tested pruned version in merging.

meta.prompt: 8k vibrant photograph of woman in nature, ultra detail, finely detailed, dramatic light, finely detailed beautiful eyes, detailed skin, depth of field
meta.negativePrompt: (bad quality, worst quality, low quality:1.2) 3d, rendering, unreal, malformed, deformed

meta.prompt: Bold RAW photo of a man in ancient armor , on a city ruins. he has an intense look, detailed skin,  (with highly detailed tattoos:1.1), finely  eyes. The shot is taken on a professional camera with a shallow depth of field, creating a natural and raw feel. The lighting is soft and adds to the mysterious atmosphere of the scene. The image is highly detailed, cinematic
